panels.description:
solar rgb(253, 151, 0)
home rgb(69, 158, 149)
battery rgb(240, 95, 141)
grid rgb(72, 143, 194)
panels.title: Energy Distribution

panels.description:
- detection = "0"  # frequent for  Smartmeter in the morning
- protection_charge = "03"  # when there is charge while output below demand in detection mode
- bypass = "1" # Bypass solar without charging
- bypass_discharge = "12"  # if discharging in bypass mode
- discharge = "2"  # only seen if no solar available
- charge = "3"  # normal charge for battery
- charge_bypass = "31"  # unused
- charge_priority = "37"  # unused
- wakeup = "4"  # Not clear short intervals during night, probably hourly? resync with the cloud
- unknown = "5" # was not observed yet
- full_bypass = "6"  # at cold temperature, when battery must not be charged and the Solarbank bypasses all directly to inverter, also solar power < 25 W
- standby = "7"
panels.title: Charging Status

panels.description:

- protection_charge = "03"  # when there is charge while output below demand in detection mode

- unknown = "5" # was not observed yet
- full_bypass = "6"  # at cold temperature, when battery must not be charged and the Solarbank bypasses all directly to inverter, also solar power < 25 W
- standby = "7"
